item.title: Federal ruling blocks Hawaii's climate change tourist tax on cruise ships

item.title: Viral '6-7' tops 2025 list of overused words and phrases
item.description: Respondents to an annual Michigan college survey of overused and misused words and phrases say “6-7” is “cooked” and should come to a “massive” and “f...

item.title: These bipartisan bills were noncontroversial -- until Trump vetoed them
item.description: President Donald Trump has issued the first vetoes of his second term, rejecting two bipartisan natural resources bills

item.title: Mississippi man serving an illegal sentence granted clemency, weeks after his brother
item.description: Two brothers who both received illegal prison sentences that were years longer than the maximum penalty for their crimes have been granted clemency by...

item.title: US imposes sanctions on 4 Venezuelan oil firms and 4 more tankers in Maduro crackdown
item.description: The U.S. has imposed sanctions on four firms in Venezuela's oil sector and designated four additional oil tankers as blocked property
